price: Na ama walio kufuru, wataambiwa: Kwani hamkuwa mkisomewa Aya zangu nanyi mkapanda kichwa, na mkawa watu wakosefu?
arabic: وَأَمَّا ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوٓاْ أَفَلَمۡ تَكُنۡ ءَايَٰتِي تُتۡلَىٰ عَلَيۡكُمۡ فَٱسۡتَكۡبَرۡتُمۡ وَكُنتُمۡ قَوۡمٗا مُّجۡرِمِينَ
footnotes: Na ama walio mkataa Mwenyezi Mungu na Mitume wake wataambiwa kwa kuwahizi: Kwani hawakukujilieni Mitume wangu? Hamkusomewa Aya zangu, nanyi mkajiona bora hamfai kuikubali haki, na mkawa kaumu ya makafiri?

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wa-ammā alladhīna kafarū afalam takun āyātī tut'lā ʿalaykum fa-is'takbartum wakuntum qawman muj'rimīna
